One of my favorite hobbies is thrifting. I prefer to purchase second-hand items over new ones. It's better for the environment and my wallet. ‚ôªÔ∏è üåé

I will sometimes resell some of my thrifted items on sites like Poshmark and Mercari.

I also try to live as a minimalist. I can only keep so many things in my closet. Whenever I find myself desiring a new item, I will look in my closet and figure out what I can replace out before I bring something new in.
